resources.string: Thank you for your interest in donating to our partner charities. Please provide the required information below so we can match the nearest partners that you can contact to donate.
Are you ready to receive donations from our partner restaurants? Please provide the required information below so we can find the nearest partners to donate to your organization immediately.

Philippine Red Cross is a premier humanitarian organization in the country that is committed on various social welfare services and promoting volunteerism. 

 Joining the Philippine Red Cross (PRC) Membership Program gives an individual self-worth as you are extending help to the most vulnerable Filipinos. 

 Philippine Red Cross Membership is a form of donation that has an accident insurance policy intended for anyone between 5 to 85 years old. As a member, an individual is entitled to accidental death, disablement and dismemberment, hospitalization and burial reimbursements.
We are currently in need of food donations for 100pax.
